whatClientsSay: What do our clients say about the Hub?

peteMartin.name: Pete Martin
peteMartin.quote: It's good to see what cleaner alternatives are available and what example is able to offer in these areas.

testimonial.question: What’s your experience in using The Hub?
testimonial.answer:
We have been using the Hub for about 18 months now and we find it simple to use. We have entered our emissions from the past seven years, which the tool neatly presents in a graph form, showing how we have been doing over those years. It really hits home to see we have made real progress as a company in reducing our carbon footprint.

In this tool, we can add our information and get instant feedback presented in a chart. It shows us if we are going in the right direction when looking at carbon emissions, or if we need to do more. Thankfully, we have been monitoring this for seven years, so we have had plans in place to reduce our emissions which the graph shows.

testimonial.question: What specific feature do you like most about it?
testimonial.answer: Several features of the tool look good, but I really like the ‘Solutions’ tab with solution information based on our interests.  It's good to see what cleaner alternatives are available and what example is able to offer in these areas. It can also really motivate us as a company to compare our emissions anonymously with industry peers and see how we rank for the year.

thomasRobisco.name: Thomas Robisco
thomasRobisco.quote: Sulzer achieved impressive carbon emission reductions and was able to challenge itself against its peers.
thomasRobisco.position: Group Head of Sustainability at Sulzer

testimonial.question: What have you been able to achieve since using The Hub?
testimonial.answer: Sulzer achieved impressive carbon emission reductions and was able to challenge itself against its peers. We value the close collaboration with the design teams as the system improves to better address companies’ needs. We like that it can also be leveraged by inviting partners to participate and build a carbon-friendly ecosystem. The tool also proposes solutions to address some of the decarbonization challenges, providing insights for designing the next improvement programs.

testimonial.question: Why would you recommend using The Hub?
testimonial.answer: The tool enables users to not only have an overview of past performance but also a forward-looking perspective. Hundreds of companies use the platform, which allows you as a company to benchmark your own performance.

lottieElwood.name: Lottie Elwood
lottieElwood.quote: Ecolab uses the tool to share verified emissions data with example and its supply chain.
lottieElwood.position: Vice President Downstream Corporate Accounts at Ecolab

testimonial.answer:
Ecolab uses the tool to share verified emissions data with example and its supply chain. Not only does The Hub reinforce Ecolab’s progress toward reducing emissions by 50% by 2030 and achieving net-zero by 2050, but it also compares their performance with example's broader supplier base.



“example’s Hub allows us to exchange emissions data, share best practices, and explore low carbon solutions.”

justinIemma.name: Justin Iemma
justinIemma.quote: It has not only given us the ability to set goals to reduce our emissions, but also set a realistic target.
justinIemma.position: CEO at Alltools WA Pty Ltd

testimonial.question: What was your absolute biggest challenge with regards to decarbonisation prior to joining the Hub?
testimonial.answer: To be honest, we were unaware of our output and how it added up until we started using The Hub. It helped us to calculate and understand our emissions and it also provides suggestions and solutions to lower these to meet our target. Now, we have been able to achieve an understanding of our current emission outputs and it has not only given us the ability to set goals to reduce our emissions, but also set a realistic target.

testimonial.question: Would you recommend the Hub?
testimonial.answer: I would definitely recommend The Hub! It’s a fantastic tool to assist companies in their goals to reduce emissions. The onboarding process was effortless and opened our eyes to our company’s usage. The Hub has allowed us to better understand our current emissions and has provided tools and direction to reduce them in the future. It’s a great initiative and tool that we would encourage other companies to utilise.

chuaSunFat.name: Chua Sun Fat
chuaSunFat.quote: The Hub comes with a variety of low-carbon solutions to explore that give insights on how to achieve our desired ambition.

testimonial.question: What was your absolute biggest challenge prior to joining the Hub?
testimonial.answer: We ran into a problem in that we didn’t know how to incorporate all data from our supply chain. Without The Hub, we noticed that most of our suppliers were not willing to join due to a lack of know-how and awareness. Usually, these kinds of tools are very pricey and take a lot of time to implement. But this all-in-one platform unburdens both us and our suppliers and is free of charge.

testimonial.question: What are the benefits you have experienced as a result of using The Hub?
testimonial.answer: We are now able to set emission targets and forecast our future emissions trendline. This helps us understand where we should focus our efforts next. Another benefit is the possibility to explore more potential solutions for decarbonisation. The Hub comes with a variety of low-carbon solutions to explore that give insights on how to achieve our desired ambition. But overall, we enjoy the fact that we can help our suppliers and partners to decarbonise, using structured methods in the tool.

howCanWeSupport: How can we support you in decarbonising your end-to-end supply chain?
